languages.text: {n}Все страдания из далекого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}прошлого{/d} встают в памяти. Вам ведомо, как заставить плоть страдать. И вы заставляете ее страдать не хуже, чем ваши былые палачи. Иокаста, прикусив губу, смотрит то на вас, то на корчащегося заговорщика. Вы оказались хорош{mf|им|ей} учени{mf|ком|цей}.{/n}

{n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все страдания из далекого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}прошлого{/d} встают в памяти. Вам ведомо, как заставить плоть страдать. And you make it suffer, your work rivalling that of your former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erinnerst dich wieder an den Schmerz deiner fernen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Vergangenheit{/d}. Du weißt, wie man Fleisch leiden lässt, also machst du genau das und stehst deinen einstigen Folterknechten dabei in nichts nach. Sauerback beißt sich auf die Lippe, als sie dich und den sich windenden Mann anstarrt. Du warst {mf|ein guter Schüler|eine gute Schülerin}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. traits.locale_text: {n}Du erinnerst dich wieder an den Schmerz deiner fernen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Vergangenheit{/d}. Du weißt, wie man Fleisch leiden lässt, also machst du genau das und stehst deinen einstigen Folterknechten dabei in nichts nach. Sauerback beißt sich auf die Lippe, als sie dich und den sich windenden Mann anstarrt. Du warst {mf|ein guter Schüler|eine gute Schülerin}.

languages.text: {n}L'angoisse de votre lointain {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}passé{/d} refait surface dans votre esprit. Vous êtes {mf|devenu maître|devenue maîtresse} dans l'art de faire souffrir et pourriez même rivaliser avec vos anciens tortionnaires. Sauerback se mord la lèvre en vous observant, vous et l'homme qui se tortille à vos pieds. Oui, vous avez visiblement été {mf|un|une} très {mf|bon|bonne} élève.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'angoisse de votre lointain {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}passé{/d} refait surface dans votre esprit. Vous êtes {mf|devenu maître|devenue maîtresse} dans l'art de faire souffrir et pourriez même rivaliser avec vos anciens tortionnaires. Sauerback se mord la lèvre en vous observant, vous et l'homme qui se tortille à vos pieds. Oui, vous avez visiblement été {mf|un|une} très {mf|bon|bonne} élève.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La angustia del lejano {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pasado{/d} resurge en tu mente. Sabes cómo hacer sufrir la carne y lo demuestras. Tu destreza rivaliza con la de tus torturadores. Sauerback se muerde el labio al miraros a ti y al hombre que se retuerce. Siempre se te dio bien aprender.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La angustia del lejano {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pasado{/d} resurge en tu mente. Sabes cómo hacer sufrir la carne y lo demuestras. Tu destreza rivaliza con la de tus torturadores. Sauerback se muerde el labio al miraros a ti y al hombre que se retuerce. Siempre se te dio bien aprender.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遠い{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}昔{/d}の苦悶が脳裏に蘇る。肉体に苦痛を与える方法は知っている。だから、それを苦しめるあなたの手さばきはかつての拷問者に匹敵するものだ。ザウアーバックは、あなたと苦痛に悶える男を見つめつつ唇を噛む。あなたは優秀な生徒だったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遠い{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}昔{/d}の苦悶が脳裏に蘇る。肉体に苦痛を与える方法は知っている。だから、それを苦しめるあなたの手さばきはかつての拷問者に匹敵するものだ。ザウアーバックは、あなたと苦痛に悶える男を見つめつつ唇を噛む。あなたは優秀な生徒だったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}过去{/d}早已黯淡的痛苦，此刻重新浮现在了你的脑海中。你知道如何让肉体痛苦，于是你对面前的囚犯施加了痛苦，你的技艺堪比之前曾折磨过你的人。苏尔贝克紧咬着嘴唇，盯着你和在地上蠕动的男人。你是位出色的学徒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}过去{/d}早已黯淡的痛苦，此刻重新浮现在了你的脑海中。你知道如何让肉体痛苦，于是你对面前的囚犯施加了痛苦，你的技艺堪比之前曾折磨过你的人。苏尔贝克紧咬着嘴唇，盯着你和在地上蠕动的男人。你是位出色的学徒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uzak {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}geçmişinde{/d} çektiğin ızdırap, zihninde kendini yeniden belli ediyor. Ete acı çektirmesini biliyorsun. Sen de önünde duran ete aynı acıyı çektiriyorsun. Becerilerin sana zamanında işkence edenlere taş çıkaracak türden. Sauerback, sana ve kıvranan adama bakarken dudağını ısırıyor. İşkence eğitimini çok iyi almışsın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anguish of your distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d} resurfaces in your mind. You know how to make flesh suffer, and so, you make it suffer, your handiwork rivalling that of your own former torturers. Sauerback bites her lip as she stares at you and the writhing man. You were a good student.{/n}
